TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartChrome extends System.Object

summary.span: 讓開發人員僅覆寫 區域中 或伺服器控制項之選取區段的呈現。

span.span: Enables developers to override the rendering for only the selected sections of or server controls in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個畫面格的週邊使用者介面 (UI) 項目是指 web 組件 chrome控制項或伺服器控制項中包含區域。Web Parts chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each control or server control contained in a zone. 控制項的 chrome 包括框線、 標題列，和圖示、 標題文字和出現在標題列的動詞命令功能表。The chrome for a control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar. 色彩的外觀會在區域層級設定，並套用至區域中的所有伺服器控制項。The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all the server controls in the zone. Web 組件控制集用法類別來呈現的 chrome控制項。The Web Parts control set uses the class to render the chrome for controls. 此外，此類別會提供開發人員進行自訂 （例如頁首或頁尾中） 的任何個別部分的呈現方式中的控制項而不需要處理這些控制項的所有呈現的區域。Additionally, this class provides a way for developers to customize the rendering of any individual section (such as the header or footer) of the controls in a zone without having to handle all the rendering for those controls. 例如，您可以覆寫方法，以自訂一些特定的樣式屬性套用至區域，但您可以依賴處理其餘的預設轉譯。For example, you can override the method to customize some specific style attributes applied to the zone, but you can rely on the default rendering to handle the rest. 類別包含數個重要的方法很有用，當您想要覆寫呈現控制項。The class contains several important methods that are useful when you want to override the rendering of controls. 其中一個是方法，可讓您變更的樣式屬性相關聯的物件用來呈現控制項的物件。One is the method, which enables you to change the style attributes of the object associated with the object used to render a control. 另一個是建構函式，您可以使用當您覆寫中的自訂方法類別來建立自訂的執行個體物件。Another is the constructor, which you use when you override the method in a custom class to create an instance of your custom object. 另一個有用的方法是方法，可用來控制 （而不是 chrome 項目，例如頁首、 頁尾和標題列） 區域中控制項的內容區域的呈現。Another useful method is the method, which you can use to control the rendering of the content area of controls in a zone (as opposed to chrome elements such as headers, footers, and title bars). 方法可讓您排除某些動詞所呈現，如果基於某些原因不想讓使用者看到這些動詞命令，在 UI 中的。The method enables you to exclude certain verbs from being rendered, if for some reason you do not want users to see those verbs in the UI. 最後，如果您想要完整控制以程式設計方式轉譯的所有層面控制項，您可以覆寫方法。Finally, if you want complete programmatic control over all aspects of rendering the controls, you can override the method. 數個屬性類別也是很有用。Several properties of the class are also useful. 並屬性會提供參考相關聯的區域物件和目前分別執行個體。The and properties provide references to the zone associated with the object and the current instance, respectively. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別來覆寫的預設轉譯中的控制項區域。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to override the default rendering of controls in a zone. 在程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 在範例中的所有控制項都裝載的網頁。A Web page that hosts all the controls in the example. - 類別，其中包含自訂的原始程式碼區域和類別。A class that contains the source code for a custom zone and a class. - 此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項。The first part of the code example is the user control. 使用者控制項的原始程式碼來自另一個主題。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 對於此程式碼範例正常運作，您需要取得使用者控制項的.ascx 檔案[逐步解說： 在 Web 組件頁面上的變更顯示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主題，並放置在此程式碼範例中的.aspx 頁面與相同的資料夾中的檔案。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 此範例的第二個部分是網頁。The second part of the example is the Web page. 請注意，沒有`Register`指示詞靠近頂端的 要註冊的已編譯的元件和標記前置詞的檔案。Note that there is a `Register` directive near the top of the file to register the compiled component and a tag prefix. 另外請注意頁面參考使用的項目自訂區域``並包含在區域內數個標準 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項。Also note that the page references the custom zone using the element `` and includes several standard ASP.NET server controls within the zone. 伺服器控制項不會實作任何實際的功能;它們僅可用於以下說明如何類別功能套用到呈現區域。The server controls do not implement any actual functionality; they are used here only to illustrate how the class features apply to rendering zones. 請注意，這些伺服器控制項，但它們不是實際控制項，您可以每個自動 （藉由 ASP.NET) 以包裝物件在執行階段，因此會有相同的功能控制項。Note that these server controls, though they are not actual controls, are each automatically wrapped (by ASP.NET) with a object at run time, so they will have the same functionality as controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/webpartchromecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/webpartchromevb.aspx#1)] 在程式碼範例的第三個部分是自訂來源區域和類別。The third part of the code example is the source for the custom zone and a class. 在 自訂區域類別的建構函式，程式碼會檢查`MyZone.RenderVerbsInMenu`屬性。In the constructor for the custom zone class, the code checks the `MyZone.RenderVerbsInMenu` property. 如果值為`true`，動詞命令功能表中呈現的每個區域中的控制項。If the value is `true`, verbs are rendered in a menu for each of the controls in the zone. 這是正常現象的預設行為，在 Web 組件控制項集合。This is the normal, default behavior in the Web Parts controls set. 如果`MyZone.RenderVerbsInMenu`屬性值是`false`這個自訂的區域中的預設值，該動詞命令會個別轉譯為每個控制項標題列中的連結。If the `MyZone.RenderVerbsInMenu` property value is `false`, which is the default in this custom zone, the verbs are rendered individually as links in the title bar of each control. 請注意，在網頁中撰寫程式碼的位置``宣告的項目，還有`RenderVerbsInMenu`屬性設為`true`，如此一來，該動詞命令會出現在功能表上的控制項。Notice that in the Web page code where the `` element is declared, there is a `RenderVerbsInMenu` attribute set to `true`, so that the verbs will appear in menus on the controls. 若要試驗這項功能，您可以設定宣告式`RenderVerbsInMenu`屬性設定為`false`，並記下指令動詞會轉譯為連結。To experiment with this feature, you can set the declarative `RenderVerbsInMenu` attribute to `false`, and note how the verbs are rendered as links. 自訂類別會覆寫在數種方法，轉譯和自訂的區域建立的執行個體`MyWebPartChrome`類別中其方法。The custom class overrides the rendering on several methods, and the custom zone creates an instance of the `MyWebPartChrome` class in its method. 這適用於自訂轉譯的頁面。This applies the custom rendering to the page. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範這兩種編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#2)] 當您載入網頁瀏覽器中時，您可以看到各種樣式和其他轉譯自訂方式中的原始程式碼`MyWebPartChrome`類別會出現在呈現區域中的控制項。When you load the Web page in a browser, you can see how the various stylistic and other rendering customizations made in the source code of the `MyWebPartChrome` class appear on the controls rendered in the zone.

span.para: 繼承自類別，在您想要覆寫的特定區段的預設轉譯或伺服器控制項。您可以選擇性地覆寫方法中，方法，並特別或方法，以自訂轉譯。若要使用您的自訂類別控制項，在區域中，開發自訂的區域，衍生自類別，並覆寫其方法。如需有關如何使用子系物件區域中，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節。

Inherit from the class when you want to override the default rendering of certain sections of or server controls. You can optionally override the method, the method, and especially the or methods, to customize the rendering. To use your custom class for the controls in a zone, develop a custom zone derived from the class, and override its method. For details on how to use a child object in a zone, see the Example section.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase zone, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager manager) cil managed
Public Sub New (zone As WebPartZoneBase, manager As WebPartManager)

span.span: The associated control.

param.name: manager
param.span: 目前網頁上的 控制項。

span.span: The control on the current page.

summary.span: 初始化控制項的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化的新執行個體類別。The initializes a new instance of the class. 它主要供區域中其方法來建立的執行個體處理 chrome 轉譯和任何自訂轉譯物件區域中的控制項。It is used primarily by a zone in its method to create an instance of the object that handles the chrome rendering and any custom rendering for controls in the zone. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範兩件事。The following code example demonstrates two things. 首先，它會建立自訂類別的新執行個體`MyWebPartChrome`藉由覆寫方法中衍生稱為區域`MyZone`。First, it creates a new instance of the custom class `MyWebPartChrome` by overriding the method in a derived zone called `MyZone`. 第二個建構函式中`MyWebPartChrome`類別，它會將指派之參數的建構函式中的物件至可用的類別內的私用欄位。Second, in the constructor of the `MyWebPartChrome` class, it assigns the objects in the parameters of the constructor to private fields that can be used within the class. 這個範例藉此賦予您存取相關聯的區域的方法和物件，是在建構函式，即使之前和屬性都可存取。This example thus gives you a way to access the associated zone and object even in the constructor, before the and properties are accessible. 最後，請注意，才能建構函式，基底建構函式必須也叫用方法宣告的一部分。Finally, note that for the constructor to work, the base constructor must also be invoked as part of the method declaration. 下列程式碼包含兩個自訂類別。The following code contains the two custom classes. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，包括網頁來裝載這些控制項，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, including the Web page to host these controls, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#2)]

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style CreateWebPartChromeStyle(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart, valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType chromeType) cil managed

abstract member CreateWebPartChromeStyle : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart * System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style override this.CreateWebPartChromeStyle : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart * System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType -> System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style

param.name: webPart
param.span: 目前正在呈現的控制項。

span.span: The control that is currently being rendered.

param.name: chromeType
param.span: 特定控制項的 Chrome 型別，其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: The type of chrome for a particular control; one of the enumeration values.

summary.span: 建立樣式物件，該樣式物件為 物件呈現的每一個 控制項提供樣式屬性。

span.span: Creates the style object that supplies style attributes for each control rendered by the object.
A that contains style attributes for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立物件，以供物件來呈現控制項。The method creates a object that is used by the object to render a control. 預設方法會建立為基礎的樣式屬性屬性值中所參考的控制項`webPart`參數。The default method creates style attributes based on the property value of the control referenced in the `webPart` parameter. 特殊的情況下，就會發生時選取控制項。A special situation occurs when a control is selected. 如果網頁為網頁顯示模式可以選取控制項，而實際上已選取目前的控制項，預設值方法也會合併之控制項的樣式資訊的樣式資訊屬性。If the page is in a page display mode where controls can be selected, and the current control is actually selected, the default method also merges the style information of the control with the style information from the property. ## Examples 此程式碼範例示範使用方法。This code example demonstrates use of the method. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下的一節，從程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法。The following section from the code example demonstrates how to override the method. 請注意，第一次擷取基底方法，所建立的樣式資訊，並接著修改藉由變更所使用的字型的樣式資訊控制項所呈現。Notice that it first retrieves the style information created by the base method, and then modifies the style information by changing the font used for the control being rendered. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#5)] 如果您載入網頁瀏覽器中，您可以看到中使用的字型控制項是所指定的覆寫方法。If you load the Web page in a browser, you can see that the font used in the controls is the one specified in the overridden method.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 不是其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: is not one of the enumeration values.

span.para: 如果您繼承自類別，您可以選擇性地覆寫方法，而您想要新增的基底方法，以自訂樣式的樣式資訊屬性的合併。如需示範，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節中的程式碼。

If you inherit from the class, you can optionally override the method, and merge the style information from the base method with custom style attributes that you want to add. For a demonstration, see the code in the Example section.

param.name: verbs
param.span: 所有動詞命令的集合，這些動詞命令與 webPart 參數中參考的控制項相關聯。

span.span: The collection of all verbs associated with the control referenced in the webPart parameter.

param.name: webPart
param.span: 目前正在呈現的控制項。

span.span: The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 根據開發人員提供的準則，在呈現中排除指定動詞命令。

span.span: Excludes specific verbs from being rendered, based on criteria provided by a developer.

returns.span: ，包含與 相關聯的所有動詞命令。

span.span: A containing all verbs associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用來自動篩選特定與相關聯的動詞命令的集合中的動詞控制項，並防止所呈現的已篩選的動詞命令。The method provides a way to automatically filter certain verbs from the collection of verbs associated with a control, and prevent the filtered verbs from being rendered.

span.span: The collection is .
- or -
is .

span.para: 如果您建立自訂類別，您可以選擇性地覆寫方法篩選出特定呈現的動詞。若要這樣做的最常見方式是建立私用的方法簽入的指令動詞的集合控制項，並決定是否應轉譯模的每個動作，根據您選擇的準則。請注意，基底方法提供許多很難重現您完全覆寫方法; 如果預設篩選條件如果您只有少數的特殊情況下，您可能要先呼叫基底方法，然後將產生的集合傳遞您自己的附加方法，以套用自訂篩選準則。

If you create a custom class, you can optionally override the method to filter out specific verbs from being rendered. The most common way to do this is to create a private method that checks the verbs in the collection of a control and determines whether each verb should be rendered, based on criteria that you choose. Note that the base method provides a lot of default filtering criteria that would be difficult to reproduce if you completely override the method; if you only have a few special cases, you might want to call the base method first, and then pass the resulting collection through your own additional method to apply your custom filtering criteria.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance string GetWebPartChromeClientID(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 目前正在呈現的控制項。

span.span: The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 取得 Web 網頁中呈現的 物件用戶端識別碼。

span.span: Gets the client ID for the object as rendered in a Web page.

returns.span: 字串，包含 物件用戶端識別碼。

span.span: A string that contains the client ID for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會取得資料表，其中包含的用戶端識別碼`webPart`所呈現。The method gets the client ID of the table that contains the `webPart` being rendered. 資料表是直接對應至轉譯的輸出物件，並套用樣式，並建立模組化的版面配置控制項當做容器使用。The table is the rendered output that corresponds directly to the object, and is used as a container to apply styles and create a modular layout for the control. 它可用於取得的用戶端識別碼以物件進行用戶端指令碼，如果您想要在 chrome 中的項目變更而不必頁面回傳至伺服器。It is useful to get the client ID of the object for client-side scripting purposes, if you want to change something in the chrome without having to post the page back to the server.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance string GetWebPartTitleClientID(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 目前正在呈現的控制項。

span.span: The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 取得包含 控制項標題之表格儲存格的用戶端識別碼。

span.span: Gets the client ID for the table cell that contains the title for a control.

returns.span: 字串，包含 標題的用戶端識別碼。

span.span: A string that contains the client ID for the title of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會擷取用戶端識別碼值，包含標題的表格儲存格`webPart`所呈現。The method retrieves the client ID value for the table cell that contains the title of the `webPart` being rendered. 重要的案例，其中方法來取得標題儲存格的用戶端識別碼`webPart`是 Web 組件拖放功能。An important scenario in which the method is used to get the client ID of the title cell of the `webPart` is for the Web Parts drag-and-drop feature. 此方法也很有用的其他用戶端指令碼的用途中。The method is also useful for other client-side scripting purposes. 例如，您可以變更標題或具有用戶端指令碼，而不需要頁面回傳至伺服器之儲存格樣式。For example, you could change the title or the style of the cell with client-side scripting, rather than having to post the page back to the server.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection GetWebPartVerbs(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 目前正在呈現的控制項。

span.span: The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 取得應使用 控制項呈現的動詞命令集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of verbs that should be rendered with a control.

returns.span: ，包含應使用 呈現的所有動詞命令。

span.span: A containing all the verbs that should be rendered with .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供有機會的開發人員，以覆寫方法，並排除某些動詞所呈現。The method provides developers with an opportunity to override the method and exclude certain verbs from being rendered. 這是類似於方法，也可以排除呈現動詞命令。This is similar to the method, which also can exclude verbs from being rendered. 不過，方法不適用於您想要用來檢查一些準則，以決定是否要呈現的動詞命令的情況。However, the method is not meant for cases where you want to check some criteria to decide whether to render a verb. 相反地，這個方法很有用，當您事先知道您一定想要排除某個動詞命令。Instead, this method is useful when you know in advance that you always want to exclude a certain verb. 例如，如果您開發自訂類別，您可能會決定您一定想要排除的關閉動詞命令上控制項，因此，使用者就可以永遠不會關閉的控制項。For example, if you develop a custom class, you might decide that you always want to exclude the close verb on controls, so that users can never close the controls. 而非設定屬性，以`false`上的所有控制項，您可以直接覆寫方法，並排除關閉任何呈現的動詞命令呈現與您的自訂控制項物件。Rather than setting the property to `false` on all the controls, you can simply override the method and exclude close verbs from being rendered on any control rendered with your custom object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example demonstrates use of the method. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下的一節，從程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法。The following section from the code example demonstrates how to override the method. 覆寫的方法會使用基底方法，來擷取中的所有動詞`webPart`控制項，然後逐一動詞命令集合中，新增要的關閉動詞命令除外的所有動詞命令物件。The overridden method uses the base method to retrieve all verbs from the `webPart` control, then iterates through the verb collection, adding all verbs except the close verb to an object. 這會減少一個動詞命令集合接著會指派給新，傳回給呼叫者。This reduced set of verbs is then assigned to a new , which is returned to the caller. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#4)] 如果您載入網頁瀏覽器中，按一下 動詞命令功能表 （標題列中的向下箭號顯示） 的每個控制項，您可以看到關閉動詞命令不會呈現任何控制項。If you load the Web page in a browser and click the verbs menu (shown with a downward arrow in the title bar) of each control, you can see that the close verb is not rendered for any control.

span.span: is .

abstract member RenderPartContents : System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter * System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> unit override this.RenderPartContents : System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter * System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> unit

param.span: 目前正在呈現的控制項。

span.span: The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 呈現 控制項的主要內容區域，但不包括頁首和頁尾。

span.span: Renders the main content area of a control, excluding the header and footer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓您覆寫的主體區域呈現`webPart`，同時讓轉譯頁首和頁尾的預設轉譯。The method enables you to override the rendering of the body area of `webPart`, while leaving rendering of the header and footer to the default rendering. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example demonstrates use of the method. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下的一節，從程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法。The following section from the code example demonstrates how to override the method. 覆寫的方法會執行兩件事，若要自訂的主體呈現控制項。The overridden method does two things to customize the rendering for the body of the control. 首先，它會檢查以判斷是否目前已選取控制項，而且，如果、 寫入字串並不會呈現內容。First, it checks to determine whether the control is currently selected, and if so, writes out a string and does not render the contents. 其次，如果未選取控制項，而且控制項之區域的型別`MyZone`，此方法會呈現控制項。Second, if the control is not selected, and if the control's zone is of type `MyZone`, the method renders the control. 如果您想要確定自訂，可以使用此第二個核取類別可用於只轉譯中特定類型的控制項設計成包含的區域物件。This latter check could be used if you wanted to ensure that a custom class can be used only to render controls in a specific type of zone that is designed to contain the object. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#6)] 如果您載入網頁瀏覽器中，您可以看到每個控制項的內容都會正常呈現。If you load the Web page in a browser, you can see that the content of each control is rendered normally. 如果您的網頁切換到設計模式 (藉由選取**設計**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項)，將其中一個控制項拖曳到標示為 「 空區域**WebPartZone2**，因為控制項的內容會以不同的方式呈現自訂物件不使用標準區域中轉譯。If you switch the page into design mode (by selecting **Design** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control) and drag one of the controls into the empty zone labeled **WebPartZone2**, the contents of the control are rendered differently, because the custom object is not being used for the rendering in a standard zone. 這是相同的效果，如果您嘗試使用自訂，您會達成以外的任何其他區域類別`MyZone`類別，因為前面的原始程式碼。This is the same effect that you would achieve if you tried to use the custom class with any other zone besides the `MyZone` class, due to the preceding source code.

span.para: 您可以選擇性地覆寫方法。因此，您可以只執行任何轉譯自訂項目，如果要，然後呼叫其方法。如果您也想依賴預設呈現，在發生連接錯誤時，首先，呼叫基底方法，然後自訂傳回基底方法。

You can optionally override the method. If so, you can simply perform whatever rendering customizations you want for , and then call its method. If you also want to rely on the default rendering in the event of connection errors, call the base method first, and then customize the that is returned from the base method.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void RenderWebPart (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer, System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RenderWebPart(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

abstract member RenderWebPart : System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter * System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> unit override this.RenderWebPart : System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter * System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> unit

span.span: The that receives the webPart content.

param.name: webPart
param.span: 目前正在呈現的控制項。

span.span: The control currently being rendered.

summary.span: 呈現完整的 控制項及其所有區段。

span.span: Renders a complete control with all its sections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呈現完整控制，使用標頭、 內容和頁尾。The method renders the complete control, with header, contents, and footer. 覆寫開發人員完成轉譯的所有層面的以程式設計方式控制這個方法提供`webPart`，並基於這個理由，若要覆寫這個方法是相當複雜。Overriding this method gives a developer complete programmatic control over rendering all aspects of `webPart`, and for that reason, overriding this method is quite complex. 與中的其他方法一樣類別，開發人員可以覆寫，如果您覆寫此方法中，常見且實用的方法是先呼叫基底方法，採取控制項，會傳回，並自訂其部分屬性，而不處理完整呈現自己。As with some other methods in the class that developers can override, if you override this method, a common and useful approach is to call the base method first, take the control that is returned, and customize some of its properties, rather than handling the complete rendering yourself.

span.span: The control that refers to is .

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property WebPartManager As WebPartManager

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得目前 執行個體的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to the current instance.

value.span: Web 網頁上目前 的參考。

span.span: A reference to the current on the Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會提供目前的參考頁面上的執行個體。The property provides a reference to the current instance on the page. ## Examples 此程式碼範例示範使用屬性。This code example demonstrates use of the property. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下列程式碼範例會使用屬性來判斷是否目前所呈現的控制項是選取的控制項，這在此範例中表示頁面位於編輯 檢視中，而且目前正在編輯控制項。The following code example uses the property to determine whether the current control being rendered is the selected control, which in this example means that the page is in edit view, and the control is currently being edited. 如果這些條件都成立，則不會呈現此控制項的主體，並將字串寫入在其位置。If these conditions are true, the body of the control is not rendered, and a string is written in its place. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#6)] 如果您載入網頁瀏覽器中，您可以藉由選取進入編輯模式切換頁面**編輯**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。If you load the Web page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 您可以按一下 編輯動詞命令，動詞命令功能表中的其中一個控制項，在轉譯頁面時，不會呈現所選取來編輯控制項的主體。You can click the edit verb in the verbs menu of either of the controls; when the page is rendered, the body of the control selected for editing is not rendered. 不過，如果您將控制項拖曳至標示為空的區域**WebPartZone2**，呈現控制項的主體。However, if you drag the control into the empty zone labeled **WebPartZone2**, the body of the control is rendered. 這是因為第二個區域是一種標準區域，而且它不會使用自訂類別，在此範例中呈現控制項。This is because the second zone is a standard zone, and it does not use the custom class in this example to render the controls.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property Zone As WebPartZoneBase

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得相關聯 區域的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to the associated zone.

value.span: 與 相關聯之 的參考。

span.span: A reference to a that is associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供的參考包含之控制項的區域物件所提供的轉譯。The property provides a reference to the zone that contains the controls for which the object provides rendering. ## Examples 此程式碼範例示範使用屬性。This code example demonstrates use of the property. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下列程式碼範例會使用屬性來判斷是否該區域目前與相關聯物件是型別的區域`MyZone`。The following code example uses the property to determine whether the zone currently associated with the object is a zone of type `MyZone`. 如果是的話，會轉譯控制項的內容。If so, the control's contents are rendered. 此程式碼會讓自訂的工作是設計來建立它的執行個體以外的任何其他區域的物件。This code would prevent the custom object from working with any other zone besides the one designed to create an instance of it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/CS/MyChrome.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartChrome_Overview/VB/MyChrome.vb#6)] 如果您載入網頁瀏覽器中，每個控制項的內容是以標準樣式呈現。If you load the Web page in a browser, the content of each control is rendered normally. 您也可以選取進入設計模式切換頁面**設計**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。You can switch the page into design mode by selecting **Design** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 如果您拖曳至控制項的其中一個標示為 「 空區域**WebPartZone2**，其內容會以不同的方式轉譯，因為自訂物件不要用於轉譯。If you drag one of the controls into the empty zone labeled **WebPartZone2**, its contents are rendered differently, because the custom object is not being used for the rendering. 這是相同的效果，如果您嘗試使用自訂，您會達成以外的任何其他區域類別`MyZone`類別，因為前面的原始程式碼。This is the same effect that you would achieve if you tried to use the custom class with any other zone besides the `MyZone` class, because of the preceding source code.
